title: ChestCommands[菜单]设置出现问题
author: geilei
txt_content:
zijue:
  COMMAND: 'console: manuadd {player} zijue'
  NAME: '&a[p]VIP1'
  LORE:
    - '&9[++]购买VIP[++]'
  ID: 399
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
  POINTS: 50

点了这个后服务器提示
This command has a price in points,but the plugin PlayerPoints was not found For security,the command has been blocked. please inform the staff

有人会解决吗QAQ
op: manuadd {player} zijue 
这个也试过了也是提示一样的

replies.author: 蓝色的鲨鱼
replies.txt_content: 需要插件PlayerPoints，请到bukkit下载，国内转载帖可能与chestcommands不兼容~亲身经历~

replies.author: geilei
replies.txt_content: 窝巢只支持 points 插件 晕

replies.author: geilei
replies.txt_content:
蓝色的鲨鱼 发表于 2016-8-3 22:44
需要插件PlayerPoints，请到bukkit下载，国内转载帖可能与chestcommands不兼容~亲身经历~ ...
能否问下有办法设置一个组的时间期限吗
PlayerPoints 这个插件的问题！删了重置下看看吧

replies.author: 蓝色的鲨鱼
replies.txt_content:
这算第二个问题了。
如果想要定时的话 不想加插件的话 只能手动去除
加插件的话，地址如下
